title.@value: Congenitally corrected transposition of great arteries

definition.@value: A congenital cardiac malformation in which the morphologically right atrium connects to the morphologically left ventricle, the morphologically left atrium connects to the morphologically right ventricle, the morphologically right ventricle connects to the aorta, and the morphologically left ventricle connects to the pulmonary trunk.

label.@value: Congenitally corrected transposition of great arteries
